text: Neckertal is a municipality in Toggenburg in the canton of St. Gallen in Switzerland. It was created on January 1, 2009, when Brunnadern, St. Peterzell, and Mogelsberg joined together to become Neckertal.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 14 January 2010 On 1 January 2023, the former municipalities of Hemberg and Oberhelfenschwil joined together and became a municipality called Neckertal. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2009 establishments in Switzerland
title: Neckertal
